articles.author: David Knowles
articles.title: Antarctica's 'doomsday glacier' is facing threat of imminent collapse, scientists warn - Yahoo Singapore News
articles.description: An Antarctic glacier the size of Florida is on the verge of collapse, scientists with the American Geophysical Union warned Monday, a nightmare scenario made...
articles.content: An Antarctic glacier the size of Florida is on the verge of collapse, scientists with the American Geophysical Union warned Monday, a nightmare scenario made worse by climate change that could eventu… [+2685 chars]
